about_the_game:
Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

The game is a Hidden Object Game.
In which you need to find objects with a certain design in beautiful locations, and click on them with the mouse.

The game is a 3D level game in which objects and characters are frozen in the picture, you have to find 20 different objects. The system automatically determines which object you need to find at the moment, so the game has a high replay value, you will need to search for different objects each time.

The player can use the mouse to move the camera around the game and look for hidden objects.
The player needs to find all the hidden objects. Then he will win the game and get points. The faster he finds objects, the more points he will receive in the leaderboard table.

You can also zoom in or out of the camera.
detailed_description:
Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

The game is a Hidden Object Game.
In which you need to find objects with a certain design in beautiful locations, and click on them with the mouse.

The game is a 3D level game in which objects and characters are frozen in the picture, you have to find 20 different objects. The system automatically determines which object you need to find at the moment, so the game has a high replay value, you will need to search for different objects each time.

The player can use the mouse to move the camera around the game and look for hidden objects.
The player needs to find all the hidden objects. Then he will win the game and get points. The faster he finds objects, the more points he will receive in the leaderboard table.

You can also zoom in or out of the camera.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 64-bit 16.04+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD Phenom II
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
